meanings.definition: To bend the head or body as a gesture of respect or greeting.
meanings.sent1: She was bowing to thank the kind teacher.
meanings.sent2: The performer was bowing after a wonderful performance.
meanings.sent3: The dog surprised everyone by bowing to greet the guests.
meanings.sent4: The trees were bowing gracefully in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The students practiced bowing in the mirror to perfect their technique.

meanings.definition: The act of bending the body in a gesture of respect or greeting.
meanings.sent1: His bowing showed his appreciation for the thoughtful gift.
meanings.sent2: The audience applauded after the musician's bowing.
meanings.sent3: The robot's bowing made everyone chuckle at the party.
meanings.sent4: The rainbow formed a beautiful bowing across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The bowing of the gymnast was flawless and elegant.

meanings.definition: A curved shape or form resembling the act of bowing.
meanings.sent1: The archer admired the perfect bowing of the bow.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted a stunning picture of a bowing.
meanings.sent3: The cake had a unique bowing on top for decoration.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed in a gentle bowing through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The clouds formed a beautiful bowing in the sky.
